name: 疯狂厨房VR
description:
The newly opened Chinese restaurant is very popular in this city. An endless stream of guests have been overwhelmed. Now the kitchen is busy! Come and let everyone taste your craft!

Be sure to complete the dishes ordered by the guest before the countdown and send them to the designated table before the guest will pay! The faster you cook, the more you will be paid. As your skills become more and more skilled, the complexity of dishes will become higher and higher, and guests will be more and more strict about the timeliness of serving, but don't rush!


Game features:
• rich variety of ingredients for you to play
• easy to understand rules also require strong hands-on skills
• the fantastic kitchen scene meets the longing for the fairy tale world
• panoramic surround immersive gaming experience
